The researcher, the Qurâ€™an, was not worse, that is: he made him an umbrella, it is said: the night is covered and God is overwhelmed by the Almighty as it is said: he wronged and wronged it, and it is also said: And it came: a night of grace, and the night is a throat and a throat.I wronged the language of Antar and Ash'ar.And its sacrifice, that is, the most prominent day, and the sacrifice in the origin of what is understood from the words of the ritual, the diastole of the sun and the increase in the day, then called it (P-32) (P-32) And it is permissible for it from the day in the corner of the interview, and it was said: the words are added to an added deletion; That is: its sun sacrificed, meaning: the light of its sun and it was that of the day, and the first is close, and it was expressed by the day with the sacrifice, because it is the honor of its signs, and it is not in it.Its walks were watered by the place of reminding the pilgrimage to the mission of the mission and returning the souls to its eternity.It was said: That was the right to remember in the place of the deeds and add the night and the sacrifice to the sky because they are talking about the grapes of the sun, and it is the sun, and it is the sun.They will be based on its movement on the saying of its movement to unite it with the ark or when they are obtained by the movement of the sun in it, in which it is in it.Metagyran, and the laughter, but it is the cousin in the ark, as it is required by the appearance of his words, the Almighty: Each in a king who praises, and the astronomer is nothing but the path of the man.Add to it because they are the first of what they appear from it; As the night is the first to turn the darkness on the side of the outskirts, and the first day by the height of the dawn and the acceptance of the light from it, and in the scouts: the night and the sun were added to the heaven And the sun is the hug in its atmosphere, and it was exposed that the night is the shadow of the earth, and it is answered that it is adopted by the opinion In the opinion of the view.It was said: I added them to it by administering that they occurred under it and their comprehension of this convergence, which was not almost dangerous in the recklessness of the Arabs from the night and the night of the night, They are night and night, the presentation of two sidelines, where the light is passionate, and it is followed by that they said: The shadow of the gratitude is the shadow of the annexes, and it is in the same And in it a look, and it is contemplated, and the additional sentence is the lowest in the same way.
